Name: BOOR
About the game: About the game Eden is a human colony far from Earth. To develop a better society, settlers made an artificial intelligence, BOOR, to help them, but this machine turned against them. When a little girl accidentally lands on the planet of Eden, she discovers BOOR has taken over and there are only a few survivors left. With her special ability to multiply herself, she'll help them destroy BOOR and reclaim the world. BOOR is a 2D puzzle-platformer game created by Dazlog Studio. Features: More than 80 engaging hand drawn rooms to explore. Mind bending puzzles and beautiful scenarios to discover. Investigate an alluring but strange world called Eden. Collectibles and secrets to uncover. Experience the power to multiply yourself. OST produced by Paltian (Jacobo CÃ¡ceres) accompanies the captivating gameplay.
